alert.note: Alert for Branch (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Branch and Hillsdale Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Litchfield to near Angola. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Hillsdale, Bronson, Hudson, Jonesville, Quincy, Litchfield, Reading, Long Lake, Jerome, Somerset, Cambria, Girard, Pittsford, Kinderhook, Moscow, Batavia, California, Ransom and Gilead. This includes Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Indiana...and southeastern and southwestern Michigan.
